snippet: Former President Hissène Habré will stand trial on charges of crimes against humanity on July 20 at a special court in Senegal.
abstract: Court officials in Chad announce that former Pres Hissene Habre will stand trial on charges of crimes against humanity in special court session in Senegal, first such case to be tried on principle of universal jurisdiction, which holds some crimes transcend national borders.
lead_paragraph: Former President Hissène Habré will stand trial on charges of crimes against humanity on July 20 at a special court in Senegal.

headline.main: Chad: Date Is Set for Ex-President’s Trial
headline.print_headline: Africa; Chad: Date Is Set for Ex-President’s Trial
